name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **React**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, complemented by experience in **Go**. Skilled in integrating AI technologies from **OpenAI**, **Anthropic**, **Hugging Face**, and **Pinecone**, alongside expertise in deploying robust **microservices** and designing effective **CI/CD pipelines**.
Demonstrated success in building AI/ML-powered platforms focused on predictive analytics and real-time processing, with a strong foundation in model evaluation and debugging skills. Experienced in ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS while collaborating cross-functionally to deliver innovative solutions. Adept at utilizing tools like **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **VRT** to enhance testing processes.
